name: F Is This? (Global Game Jam 2020)
description:
Hey there!                                                                                                                                                      Are you good at drawing?                                                                                                                          Are you good at improvising?                                                                                                                Wanna put those skills to the test? 

Well, you're in luck! F is This is a physical card party game with a specially made mobile app for Android where players are tasked to draw the different prompts given to them before the time runs out. At the end of it, your group of friends will need to figure out what is it you're actually trying to draw. 

Compete with them to see who is the better artist. Think you got the skills? Well, only one way to find out...

Fun for all ages and stressful regardless :)

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Credits:-

  1. Adam Danial
  2. Samantha
  3. Xinyi
  4.  Leon
